title: Document Filtering
description: Filter operators to limit the matching result set before method invocation

$and.title: AND-style query clauses
$and.description: Dictates that documents much match all child clauses

$or.title: OR-style query clauses
$or.description: Dictates that documents much match any child clauses

$not.title: NOT-style query clauses
$not.description: Dictates that documents much match no child clauses

$exists.title: Existence Filters
$exists.description: Filters to verify whether fields exist in documents

additionalProperties.description: Boolean value to specify whether the field should exist
Coordinates to apply as bounds of a polygon, in the form of longitude/latitude pairs

$match.title: Matching Filters
$match.description: Abitrary filters to compare values for equality

oneOf.description: Matching clauses in a standard OR-style
Arbitrary value the field must match

$prefix.title: Prefix Filters
$prefix.description: Arbitrary strings to locate at the start of a field value

oneOf.description: Prefix clauses in a standard OR-style
Single prefix the value must begin with

$range.title: Range Filtering
$range.description: Filters on scalable values with plausible bounds

additionalProperties.description: Range bounds to apply to the specified field

$suffix.title: Suffix Filters
$suffix.description: Arbitrary strings to locate at the end of a field value

oneOf.description: Suffix clauses in a standard OR-style
Single suffix the value must end with
